name: Maristice
description: Maristice is a doujin 2.5D (isometric) combination of puzzle-solving and platform Tōhō fangame based on Solstice. The main heroine is Marisa Kirisame, she is trying to retrieve her broomstick from the Scarlet Devil Mansion (Patchouli stole the broom in revenge and divided Marisa's vehicle into 7 pieces). Marisa walks into various rooms, avoids traps and enemies, collects items and solves puzzles.
